sentences.sentence: Neither side would have a real incentive to start a war. Ergo, peace would reign.
sentences.translation: 双方都没有发动战争的真实动机。因此，和平将会到来。

sentences.sentence: Ergo, no trace of either of those great loves remains.
sentences.translation: 也就是说，那些无边的爱一丝一毫都没有留下。

sentences.sentence: They were the hands of the professor; ergo, he was now the professor.
sentences.translation: 这是教授的双手，因此，他如今就是名副其实的教授了。
